column4: I got Ubuntu 8.10 and Intel 3945ABG wireless which is not working. Could anyone help?
perhaps you could explain the problem here, in more detail
nicely done. :)  what is the result of this command:  iwlist wlan0 scan
(you may need to run it a few times)
could you paste the output of the dmesg command?
hrmmmmm, that is not a good message.... checking
okay, what is the output of this command:  lshw -C network
okay - these may seem like really odd questions, but please bare with me. :)  is this a laptop? if so, is there an on/off switch for the wireless device on it somewhere?
okay, is linux-firmware installed?  dpkg -l | grep ^ii | grep linux-firmware
can you sudo rmmod iwl3945 && sudo modprobe iwl3945 debug=0x43fff  , try again and repeat the dmesg pastebin?
check this out and give it a whirl: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/248321
